about.text: Welcome to Mallorca Gardens, the premier gardening and landscape maintenance team in Mallorca. We specialize in custom and sustainable solutions, enhancing your outdoor spaces with attention to detail and customer satisfaction. Transform your garden into a paradise with us.
about.title: A Passionate Team of Expert Gardeners

cards.text: Custom garden designs tailored to your style and preferences. We bring your vision to life.
cards.title: Personalized Garden Designs

cards.text: Our expert gardeners provide year-round maintenance to ensure your garden flourishes and remains vibrant.
cards.title: Professional Garden Maintenance

cards.text: Transform your outdoor space into an eco-friendly haven that will leave your neighbors in awe.
cards.title: Creating Stunning and Sustainable Landscapes

cards.text: Customer satisfaction is our top priority. We go the extra mile to fulfil your gardening dreams.
cards.title: Customer Happiness Guarantee

benefits.text: Transform your outdoor spaces with Mallorca Gardens
benefits.title: Why choose Mallorca Gardens

cta.text: Contact us for a free consultation and let us bring your unique vision to life.

footer.text: Our expert team specializes in custom and sustainable gardening solutions across beautiful Mallorca.

location.text: No matter where your property is located on the island, our professional gardening team is ready to help. We provide complete island-wide coverage for maintenance and landscaping.
location.title: Serving All of Mallorca

cards.text: Creative and sustainable garden designs tailored to your space and lifestyle.
cards.title: Garden Design

cards.text: Expert care to keep your lawn teal, your plants healthy, and your garden beautiful.
cards.title: Lawn & Plant Care

cards.text: Comprehensive maintenance plans to ensure your garden looks its best all year round.
cards.title: Full Maintenance

cards.text: Specialised tree and shrub care for vibrant, flourishing landscapes.
cards.title: Comprehensive Tree and Shrub Care

cards.text: Your Pool, Our Passion. Design, build, and maintain your Mallorca dream pool.
cards.title: Build and Maintain Pools

cards.text: We offer expert matting and gravelling services to transform your outdoor spaces into long-lasting, eye-catching areas.
cards.title: Matting and Gravelling Services

services.text: From design to regular maintenance, we offer a complete range of services to make your garden thrive.
services.title: Bespoke Services
